headline: Positive Picture Emerging from Q3 Earnings Season
summary: The Q3 earnings and revenue growth pace for S&P 500 members that have reported represent an acceleration relative to what we saw from this same group of companies in recent quarters. Can the momentum continue?

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Ford Motor Stock?
summary: Ford Motor has underperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are cautious about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Ford Motor Stock?
raw.summary: Ford Motor has underperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are cautious about the stock’s prospects.

headline: 3 Industrials Stocks We Steer Clear Of
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. But their prominence also brings high exposure to the ups and downs of economic cycles. Luckily, the tide is turning in their favor as the industry’s 35.1% return over the past six months has topped the S&P 500 by 11.2 percentage points.

headline: Ford CEO Jim Farley targets major problem with its cars
summary: Ford set an ignominious record when it issued its 78th recall earlier this year, surpassing General Motors' 2014 record. But the company wasn't finished. By July, it had issued its 89th recall of 2025. It has over 100 recalls issued with more than two months left in the year. 2024: 2.08 million ...

headline: Does Ford’s 36% Rally in 2025 Still Offer Value for Investors?
summary: If you’re sizing up what to do with Ford Motor stock, you’re certainly not alone, especially with so many investors on the hunt for value in this ever-evolving market. Ford has been on a pretty impressive ride lately, gaining 4.5% over the past week, 9.3% in the last month, and clocking a strong 36.1% increase year-to-date. Stretch that lens back to the last five years, and we’re talking a gain of 117.1%. All this momentum has put Ford in the spotlight, and a lot of that optimism traces back...
